books.title: Agile Web Development with Rails
books.author: Sam Ruby, Dave Thomas, David Heinemeier Hansson
books.description: Ruby on Rails helps you produce high-quality, beautiful-looking web applications quickly

books.title: Flask Web Development
books.author: Miguel Grinberg
books.description: Flask: web development, one drop at a time.

books.title: Agile web development with rails: a Pragmatic guide
books.author: Dave Thomas, David Heinemeier Hansson, Leon Breedt, Mike Clark, Thomas Fuchs, Andrea Schwarz
books.description: Rails is the framework of choice for the new generation of Web 2.0 developers. Agile Web Development with Rails is the book for that generation.

books.title: CakePHP Application Development
books.author: Ahsanul Bari, Anupom Syam
books.description: Step-by-step introduction to rapid web development using the open-source MVC CakePHP framework

books.title: Alex Homer, ASP.NET 2.0 Visual Web Developer 2005
books.author: David Sussman
books.description: This Starter Kit serves as an entry-level introduction centered around prebuilt projects that developers can easily deploy and customize for their own sites.

books.title: PHP Oracle Web Development
books.author: Yuli Vasiliev
books.description: PHP is a popular web scripting language, and is often used to create database-driven web sites.

books.title: WordPress for Web Developers: An Introduction for Web Professionals
books.author: Stephanie Leary (auth.)
books.description: An Introduction for Web Professionals WordPress for Web Developers is a complete guide for web designers and developers who want to begin building sites with WordPress.

books.title: MODx Web Development
books.author: Antano Solar John, Antano Solar John
books.categories: Computer Science Server Side Scripting PHP
books.description: About this book. MODx is a content management system and PHP web application framework rolled into one.

books.title: Professional JavaScript for Web Developers
books.author: Nicholas C. Zakas
books.description: From JavaScript-specific object-oriented programming and inheritance, to combining JavaScript with HTML and other markup languages, expert instruction walks you through the fundamentals and beyond.

books.title: Art of Java Web Development
books.author: Neal Ford
books.description: Art of Java Web Development: Struts, Tapestry, Commons, Velocity, JUnit, Axis, Cocoon, InternetBeans, WebWork.

books.title: Agile Web Development with Rails 4th Edition
books.author: the pragmatic programmers

books.title: Beginning CSS Web Development: From Novice to Professional
books.author: Simon Collison
books.description: It provides you with what you need to know, faster. It is also completely up to date, covering the most modern CSS standards and design techniques.

books.title: Beginning PHP 6, Apache, MySQL 6 Web Development
books.author: Timothy Boronczyk
books.description: The primary audience includes PHP beginners, although basic HTML knowledge is useful.

books.title: Web development solutions : Ajax, APIs, libraries, and hosted services made easy
books.author: Christian Heilmann; Mark Norman Francis
books.description: It starts from the very beginning of your journey, showing you what's available, what you need, and how to set up an effective development environment.

books.title: Instant Web Scraping with Java
books.author: Ryan Mitchell
books.description: Instant Web Scraping with Java will teach how to build your own web scrapers using real-world scraping examples that collect and store data from Wikipedia, public records data sites, IP address geolocation services, and more.

books.title: Beginning Smartphone Web Development
books.author: Gail Frederick, Rajesh Lal
books.description: One of the first books on Smartphone specific Web development. Mobile is a very dynamic growth area for developers as iPhone and BlackBerry continue to be hot along with the emergence of Android, Palm Pre webOS, etc.

books.title: Full Stack Web Development with Backbone.js
books.author: Patrick Mulder
books.description: Learn how to build a full-stack application with Backbone.js by taking advantage of JavaScript modules, workflow automation, and Backbone's interface building.

books.title: The Microsoft Expression Web Developer's Guide to ASP.NET 3.5
books.author: Jim Cheshire
books.description: Learn to create ASP.NET applications using Visual Web Developer 2008.

books.title: Tapestry 5
books.author: Alexander Kolesnikov
books.description: Building Web Applications: A step-by-step guide to Java Web development with the developer-friendly Apache Tapestry framework

books.title: Developing Web Apps with Haskell and Yesod: Safety-Driven Web Development
books.author: Michael Snoyman
books.description: This fast-moving guide introduces web application development with Haskell and Yesod, a potent language/framework combination that supports high-performing applications that are modular, type-safe, and concise.
